name: Blue Mango Business
tag_list: website, corporate, branding, brand, webmarketing, marketing, viral, iphone, mobile
overview:
Blue Mango Business is a full service agency specialized in corporate branding. This means that we are not only able to create your website or blog in the best manner you could ever think about it, but we can help you to start to be YOU on internet.

Our company can make an audit of your firm, and then propose you the best things to do to enhance your online being, from improving your web 2.0 website to create a real buzz, using viral communication through social networks such as Facebook, Twitter, etc… and even more (iphone applications, mobile solutions, etc…)

We also can help you in creating and managing your own company blog, or your e-commerce platform.

By choosing Blue Mango Business to handle your project, be sure that you not only choose a professionnal corporate branding agency made with the best advisory consultants but also a huge address book which will help your business to start and grow as fast as it deserves.

Feel free to contact us in order to discuss your project, select the good timelines, and turn your project into reality.
